description: Compliance framework for cold email outreach (CAN-SPAM, GDPR, CASL). Review with legal counsel before launching campaigns.

requirements: Include physical mailing address in every email
Honor unsubscribe requests within 10 business days
Identify the message as an advertisement

gdpr.consent_model: opt-in (with Legitimate Interest exception for B2B)
requirements: Document Legitimate Interest Assessment (LIA) for each campaign
Only email business addresses (never personal email)
Include sender identity and contact details
Respond to data subject access requests within 30 days
gdpr.penalty: Up to EUR 20 million or 4% of global annual revenue

requirements: Express or implied consent required before sending
Implied consent: existing business relationship within 2 years
Include sender identity, mailing address, and unsubscribe mechanism
casl.penalty: Up to $10 million CAD per violation

universal_best_practices: Always include an unsubscribe link/mechanism in every email
Only email business addresses (never personal addresses)
Maintain a global suppression list across ALL tools and campaigns
Document your legal basis for each campaign
Honor opt-outs within 24 hours (not just the legal maximum)
Never email someone who has unsubscribed from ANY campaign
Use accurate sender name and 'From' address

suppression_list.sync_frequency: Real-time via webhooks, daily reconciliation batch
suppression_list.storage: Google Sheets 'Suppression List' tab + Instantly workspace suppression
